summary: Salva Kiir Mayardit  is a South Sudanese politician who has been President of South Sudan since its independence in 2011. Prior to independence, he was President of the Government of Southern Sudan, as well as First Vice President of Sudan, from 2005 to 2011.
full_text:
Salva Kiir Mayardit  is a South Sudanese politician who has been President of South Sudan since its independence in 2011. Prior to independence, he was President of the Government of Southern Sudan, as well as First Vice President of Sudan, from 2005 to 2011.
^ Sheikholeslami, Ali . "Who Is Salva Kiir?". Euronews.com.
title: Salva Kiir Mayardit
